hotel.title: Grand Bohemian Hotel
hotel.description: Stylish dining room & bar with a rooftop terrace at the Grand Bohemian Hotel Mountain Brook.

restaurants.title: Habitat Feed and Social
restaurants.description: Stylish dining room & bar with a rooftop terrace at the Grand Bohemian Hotel Mountain Brook.

restaurants.title: Bottega
restaurants.description: Intimate restaurant offering refined Italian fare & cocktails amid dark woods & outdoor tables.

restaurants.title: Another Broken Egg Cafe
restaurants.description: Casual chain featuring egg dishes & other breakfast items, plus brunch sandwiches.

restaurants.title: MELT
restaurants.description: Eatery serving melted cheese sandwiches, fries & local beers in a hip space with reclaimed wood.

restaurants.title: Char Bar No. 7
restaurants.description: The perfect mix between upscale and casual, CharBar No. 7 offers fresh seafood & chicken dishes, delicious sandwiches along with signature & DIY salads.

restaurants.title: Post Office Pies
restaurants.description: Wood-fired pizza, pasta, sandwiches, and more with a full bar + TVs.

restaurants.title: Ladybird Taco
restaurants.description: Breakfast and lunch tacos inspired by the TX taco scene served alongside full barista service.

drinks.title: Oteys
drinks.description: Lively pub featuring pub fare & cocktails plus local live music acts in the evenings.

drinks.title: Key Circle Commons
drinks.description: Historic Birmingham 'roundabout' at the top of Red Mountain featuring craft cocktails and live music.

drinks.title: Carrigan's Public House
drinks.description: Airy, industrial spot with a patio & roof deck for upscale pub fare, craft beer & cocktails.

drinks.title: Vino
drinks.description: Intimate, elegant eatery offering upscale American & Mediterranean fare plus wines.

drinks.title: Mayawell
drinks.description: Mayawell explores tequilas and mezcals in its innovative house cocktails. Local craft beer, Mexican beer, and wine are also served.

activities.title: Birmingham Zoo
activities.description: Must-see attraction, with approximately 950 animals of 230 species calling it home.

activities.title: McWane Science Center
activities.description: State-of-the-art hands-on science center, aquarium, and 250-seat IMAX Dome Theater

activities.title: Vulcan Park and Museum
activities.description: Features the largest cast iron statue in the world, and is the city symbol of Birmingham, Alabama, United States, reflecting its roots in the iron and steel industry.

activities.title: Barber Motorsports Museum
activities.description: Contemporary, glass-enclosed setup for 1,200+ motorcycles & race cars with an adjacent road course.

activities.title: Sloss Furnaces National Historical Landmark
activities.description: National Historic Landmark and industrial museum in Birmingham, AL and one of the first industrial sites in the U.S. to be preserved and restored for public use.

other.title: Brombergs
other.description: Upscale jewelry store and repair service in Mountain Brook.

other.title: Leaf & Petal
other.description: Nearby florist with beautiful flowers and pottery.

other.title: Mountain Brook Creamery
other.description: Straightforward ice cream parlor with specialty sundaes & a modest seating area.

other.title: Aâ€™mano Gifts
other.description: Gift shop offering unique offerings for special occasions.

other.title: Vitola
other.description: Nearby boutique offering premium cigars and accessories.
